item.title: The functionality to add fields to Visual Basic is not functioning in GP 9.
item.description: I’ve encountered a recurring issue in GP 9 where new fields don’t show up in Visual Basic, even though the window appears in the VBA editor. The fields are missing from the object drop-down list within the code window. David Musgrave offered a solution on eggheadcafe.com, indicating that a corrupted Dynamics.vba file might be the culprit. After deleting my Dynamics.vba file, the newly added fields appeared correctly.
